scripts.preReport: npm run delete:reportFolder & npm run delete:summaryreportFolder
scripts.postReport: npm run reportMerge & npm run htmlReport
scripts.test: npm run preReport & npm run chrome -- -s cypress/integration/1-getting-started/* & npm run postReport
scripts.test1: npm run preReport & npm run chrome -- -s cypress/integration/1-getting-started/todo.spec.js
scripts.test3: npm run test1 -- --group group1 --ci-build-id '1' & npm run test2 -- --group group2 --ci-build-id '1'
scripts.dashBoard: npm run preReport & npm run chrome -- -s cypress/integration/1-getting-started/* & npm run postReport
